title: The Baal Temple in New York City
subtitle: The provisional versions of the Temple of Baal (which ISIL destroyed in Syria) planned by the city of New York and London raised inaccurate rumours on the Internet; the first one was suspended indefinitely.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The Baal Temple in New York and London is being rebuilt as an operational house of worship, with more temples to follow.
